channel.title: Life Engineering • Blog series by Yassen Shopov
channel.description: The blog is a collection of my best articles, how-to's and other digital content about Notion, productivity, digital organization and life engineering.

image.title: Life Engineering • Blog series by Yassen Shopov

item.title: How I made my first 1$ online with Digital Art 🪙
item.description: I made my first dollar selling digital art on the web in 2020. That was just the beginning of my journey as a digital content creator. Read how I did it.
item.dc:creator: yassenshopov.com

item.title: Notion - how to make it faster? Speed up your workspace 🐇
item.description: Notion is the productivity tool of choice for a lot of people. In this article, we will go over ways to make it run faster and more efficiently.
item.dc:creator: yassenshopov.com
